mapper.select: select * from cell order by no

select * from (select warehouse.code warehousecode, warehouse.name warehousename, area.code areacode, area.ware_no warehouselocation, area.name areaname, rack.code rackcode, rack.area_no arealocation, rack.name rackname, cell.no no,cell.code cellcode, cell.rack_no racklocation, cell.name cellname from area, rack, cell, warehouse where warehouse.no = area.ware_no and area.no = rack.area_no and rack.no = cell.rack_no) where no=#{no}
